response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value for us at $1,500,000. Considering its exceptional quality and the unique benefits it offers, I am confident it will meet and exceed your expectations. I am extending an exclusive offer to you to acquire this product at a special price of $1,200,000. This is an opportunity not to be missed, as it represents a significant savings compared to its market value. Should you choose to accept this offer, we assure you of a seamless transaction and unparalleled customer service. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1200000}
